Title: Vladimir Lifschitz
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 19:45:15 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 3723 Last-Modified: Friday, 20-Dec-96 18:40:47 GMT Vladimir Lifschitz When feeling burdened or downcast,... the human mind will gladly turn to the realms of Mathematics, where a lucid and precise grasp of objectivities is obtained and insight is gained so pleasantly through appropriate concept formation.
